name: admin.users.session.list
desc: List active user sessions for an organization

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 - 1000 both inclusive.

team_id.desc: The ID of the workspace you'd like active sessions for. If you pass a `team_id`, you'll need to pass a `user_id` as well.

user_id.desc: The ID of user you'd like active sessions for. If you pass a `user_id`, you'll need to pass a `team_id` as well.

errors.admin_unauthorized: The owner of this token isn't authorized to list sessions.
errors.bots_not_allowed: Bot sessions are not listed by this method.
errors.feature_not_enabled: This method is only available to Enterprise customers.
errors.invalid_auth: The provided token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
errors.not_an_admin: The owner of this token isn't an Org Owner or Admin.
errors.missing_team: A `team_id` must be provided with a `user_id`.
errors.missing_user: A `user_id` must be provided with a `team_id`.
errors.team_not_found: There was an error finding the requested workspace.
errors.unknown_method: This method is currently not available.
errors.user_not_found: There was an error finding the requested user.
